verses.text: Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w*, The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w said|strong="H0559"\w* that he would \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* in the thick \w darkness|strong="H6205"\w*.

But I have \w built|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w habitation|strong="H2073"\w* for thee, and a \w place|strong="H4349"\w* for thy \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w turned|strong="H5437"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* the whole \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: and all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*.

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add be\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, who hath with his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w fulfilled|strong="H4390"\w* \add that\add* which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* with his \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w* to my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

Since the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* that I brought \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* out of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w* I \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* no \w city|strong="H5892"\w* among all the \w tribes|strong="H7626"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* in, that my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* might be there; neither \w chose|strong="H0977"\w* I any \w man|strong="H0376"\w* to be a \w ruler|strong="H5057"\w* over my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

But I have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, that my \w name|strong="H8034"\w* might be there; and have \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* to be over my \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Now it was in the \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

But the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, Forasmuch as it was in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* to \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, thou didst \w well|strong="H2895"\w* in that it was in thine \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*:

\w Notwithstanding|strong="H7535"\w* thou shalt not \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; but thy \w son|strong="H1121"\w* which shall come \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* out of thy \w loins|strong="H2504"\w*, he shall \w build|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for my \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* therefore hath \w performed|strong="H6965"\w* his \w word|strong="H1697"\w* that he hath \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w*: for I am risen \w up|strong="H6965"\w* in the room of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and am \w set|strong="H3427"\w* on the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, as the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w promised|strong="H1696"\w*, and have \w built|strong="H1129"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* for the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And in \w it|strong="H8033"\w* have I \w put|strong="H7760"\w* the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w*, wherein \add is\add* the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, that he \w made|strong="H3772"\w* with the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

¶ And he \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* in the presence of all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and spread \w forth|strong="H6566"\w* his \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*:

For \w Solomon|strong="H8010"\w* had \w made|strong="H6213"\w* a \w brasen|strong="H5178"\w* \w scaffold|strong="H3595"\w*, of \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w long|strong="H0753"\w*, and \w five|strong="H2568"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w broad|strong="H7341"\w*, and \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w cubits|strong="H0520"\w* \w high|strong="H6967"\w*, and had \w set|strong="H5414"\w* it in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w court|strong="H5835"\w*: and upon it he \w stood|strong="H5975"\w*, and kneeled \w down|strong="H1288"\w* upon his \w knees|strong="H1290"\w* before all the \w congregation|strong="H6951"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and spread \w forth|strong="H6566"\w* his \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* toward \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*,\f + \fr 6.13 \ft long…: Heb. the length thereof, etc\f*

And \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \add there is\add* no \w God|strong="H0430"\w* like thee in the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, nor in the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*; which \w keepest|strong="H8104"\w* \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*, and \add shewest\add* \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w* unto thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, that \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee with all their \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*:

Thou which hast \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* with thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* that which thou hast \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* him; and \w spakest|strong="H1696"\w* with thy \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*, and hast \w fulfilled|strong="H4390"\w* \add it\add* with thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, as \add it is\add* this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.

Now therefore, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* with thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w* that which thou hast \w promised|strong="H1696"\w* him, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, There shall not \w fail|strong="H3772"\w* thee a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* in my \w sight|strong="H6440"\w* to \w sit|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w throne|strong="H3678"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*; yet \w so|strong="H7535"\w* that thy \w children|strong="H1121"\w* take \w heed|strong="H8104"\w* to their \w way|strong="H1870"\w* to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in my \w law|strong="H8451"\w*, as thou hast \w walked|strong="H1980"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* me.\f + \fr 6.16 \ft There…: Heb. There shall not a man be cut off\f*

Now then, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, let thy \w word|strong="H1697"\w* be \w verified|strong="H0539"\w*, which thou hast \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* unto thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

But will \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in very \w deed|strong="H0552"\w* \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* with \w men|strong="H0120"\w* on the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*? behold, \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* and the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* of \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* cannot \w contain|strong="H3557"\w* thee; how much less this \w house|strong="H1004"\w* which I have \w built|strong="H1129"\w*!

Have \w respect|strong="H6437"\w* therefore to the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and to his \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w cry|strong="H7440"\w* and the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* which thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w prayeth|strong="H6419"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee:

That thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* may be \w open|strong="H6605"\w* upon this \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w day|strong="H3119"\w* and \w night|strong="H3915"\w*, upon the \w place|strong="H4725"\w* whereof thou hast \w said|strong="H0559"\w* that thou wouldest \w put|strong="H7760"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* there; to \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* which thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w prayeth|strong="H6419"\w* toward this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.\f + \fr 6.20 \ft toward…: or, in this place\f*

\w Hearken|strong="H8085"\w* therefore unto the \w supplications|strong="H8469"\w* of thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, and of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, which they shall \w make|strong="H6419"\w* toward this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*: \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou from thy \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, \add even\add* from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*; and when thou \w hearest|strong="H8085"\w*, \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w*.\f + \fr 6.21 \ft make: Heb. pray\f*\f + \fr 6.21 \ft toward…: or, in this place\f*

¶ If a \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* against his \w neighbour|strong="H7453"\w*, and an \w oath|strong="H0423"\w* be \w laid|strong="H5375"\w* upon him to make him \w swear|strong="H0422"\w*, and the \w oath|strong="H0423"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thine \w altar|strong="H4196"\w* in this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*;\f + \fr 6.22 \ft and an oath…: Heb. and he require an oath of him\f*

Then \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, and \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, by \w requiting|strong="H7725"\w* the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w*, by \w recompensing|strong="H5414"\w* his \w way|strong="H1870"\w* upon his own \w head|strong="H7218"\w*; and by \w justifying|strong="H6663"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, by \w giving|strong="H5414"\w* him according to his \w righteousness|strong="H6666"\w*.

¶ And if thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* be put to the \w worse|strong="H5062"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w*, because they have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against thee; and shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* and \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* and make \w supplication|strong="H2603"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee in this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*;\f + \fr 6.24 \ft be put…: or, be smitten\f*\f + \fr 6.24 \ft in: or, toward\f*

Then \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou from the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and bring them \w again|strong="H7725"\w* unto the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which thou \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* to them and to their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.

¶ When the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* is shut \w up|strong="H6113"\w*, and there is no \w rain|strong="H4306"\w*, because they have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against thee; \add yet\add* if they \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* toward this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*, and \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* from their \w sin|strong="H2403"\w*, when thou dost \w afflict|strong="H6031"\w* them;\f + \fr 6.26 \ft toward…: or, in this place\f*

Then \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w*, and \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* the \w sin|strong="H2403"\w* of thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, when thou hast \w taught|strong="H3384"\w* them the \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, wherein they should \w walk|strong="H3212"\w*; and \w send|strong="H5414"\w* \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* upon thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* for an \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*.

¶ If there be \w dearth|strong="H7458"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, if there be \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w*, if there be \w blasting|strong="H7711"\w*, or \w mildew|strong="H3420"\w*, \w locusts|strong="H0697"\w*, or \w caterpillers|strong="H2625"\w*; if their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* \w besiege|strong="H6887"\w* them in the \w cities|strong="H8179"\w* of their \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; whatsoever \w sore|strong="H5061"\w* or whatsoever \w sickness|strong="H4245"\w* \add there be:\add*\f + \fr 6.28 \ft in the cities…: Heb. in the land of their gates\f*

\add Then\add* what \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \add or\add* what \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w* soever shall be made of any \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, or of all thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, when every \w one|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w know|strong="H3045"\w* his own \w sore|strong="H5061"\w* and his own \w grief|strong="H4341"\w*, and shall spread \w forth|strong="H6566"\w* his \w hands|strong="H3709"\w* in this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*:\f + \fr 6.29 \ft in: or, toward\f*\f + \fr 6.29 \ft toward…: or, in this place\f*

Then \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* thy \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* \w place|strong="H4349"\w*, and \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w*, and \w render|strong="H5414"\w* unto every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* according unto all his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, whose \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w*; (for thou only \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* the \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*:)

That they may \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thee, to \w walk|strong="H3212"\w* in thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*, so long \w as|strong="H3117"\w* they \w live|strong="H2416"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which thou \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* unto our \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*.\f + \fr 6.31 \ft so long…: Heb. all the days which\f*\f + \fr 6.31 \ft in the land: Heb. upon the face of the land\f*

¶ Moreover concerning the \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w*, which is not of thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, but is \w come|strong="H0935"\w* from a \w far|strong="H7350"\w* \w country|strong="H0776"\w* for thy \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w name’s|strong="H8034"\w* sake, and thy \w mighty|strong="H2389"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and thy stretched \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*; if they \w come|strong="H0935"\w* and \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* in this \w house|strong="H1004"\w*;\f + \fr 6.32 \ft toward…: or, in this place\f*

Then \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou from the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \add even\add* from thy \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* \w place|strong="H4349"\w*, and \w do|strong="H6213"\w* according to all that the \w stranger|strong="H5237"\w* \w calleth|strong="H7121"\w* to thee for; that all \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*, and \w fear|strong="H3372"\w* thee, as \add doth\add* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, and may \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that this \w house|strong="H1004"\w* which I have \w built|strong="H1129"\w* is \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.\f + \fr 6.33 \ft this…: Heb. thy name is called upon this house\f*

If thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* to \w war|strong="H4421"\w* against their \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* that thou shalt \w send|strong="H7971"\w* them, and they \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* unto thee \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* this \w city|strong="H5892"\w* which thou hast \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*, and the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* which I have \w built|strong="H1129"\w* for thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*;

Then \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou from the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w* their \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* and their \w supplication|strong="H8467"\w*, and \w maintain|strong="H6213"\w* their \w cause|strong="H4941"\w*.\f + \fr 6.35 \ft cause: or, right\f*

If they \w sin|strong="H2398"\w* against thee, (for \add there is\add* no \w man|strong="H0120"\w* which \w sinneth|strong="H2398"\w* not,) and thou be \w angry|strong="H0599"\w* with them, and \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* them over \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \add their\add* \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and they carry them \w away|strong="H7617"\w* \w captives|strong="H7617"\w* unto a \w land|strong="H0776"\w* far \w off|strong="H7350"\w* or \w near|strong="H7138"\w*;\f + \fr 6.36 \ft they carry them away captives: Heb. they that take them captives carry them away\f*

Yet \add if\add* they \w bethink|strong="H7725"\w* themselves in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* whither they are carried \w captive|strong="H7617"\w*, and \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* and \w pray|strong="H2603"\w* unto thee in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of their \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, We have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w*, we have done \w amiss|strong="H5753"\w*, and have dealt \w wickedly|strong="H7561"\w*;\f + \fr 6.37 \ft bethink…: Heb. bring back to their heart\f*

If they \w return|strong="H7725"\w* to thee with all their \w heart|strong="H3820"\w* and with all their \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* of their \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*, whither they have carried them \w captives|strong="H7617"\w*, and \w pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w toward|strong="H1870"\w* their \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which thou \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* unto their \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w*, and \add toward\add* the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* which thou hast \w chosen|strong="H0977"\w*, and toward the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* which I have \w built|strong="H1129"\w* for thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*:

Then \w hear|strong="H8085"\w* thou from the \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \add even\add* from thy \w dwelling|strong="H3427"\w* \w place|strong="H4349"\w*, their \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* and their \w supplications|strong="H8467"\w*, and \w maintain|strong="H6213"\w* their \w cause|strong="H4941"\w*, and \w forgive|strong="H5545"\w* thy \w people|strong="H5971"\w* which have \w sinned|strong="H2398"\w* against thee.\f + \fr 6.39 \ft cause: or, right\f*

Now, my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, let, I beseech thee, thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* be \w open|strong="H6605"\w*, and \add let\add* thine \w ears|strong="H0241"\w* \add be\add* \w attent|strong="H7183"\w* unto the \w prayer|strong="H8605"\w* \add that is made\add* in this \w place|strong="H4725"\w*.\f + \fr 6.40 \ft unto…: Heb. to the prayer of this place\f*

Now therefore \w arise|strong="H6965"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, into thy \w resting|strong="H5118"\w* place, thou, and the \w ark|strong="H0727"\w* of thy \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*: let thy \w priests|strong="H3548"\w*, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, be \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* with \w salvation|strong="H8668"\w*, and let thy \w saints|strong="H2623"\w* \w rejoice|strong="H8055"\w* in \w goodness|strong="H2896"\w*.

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, turn not \w away|strong="H7725"\w* the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of thine \w anointed|strong="H4899"\w*: \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* the \w mercies|strong="H2617"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w* thy \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*.
